mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repair (student_id, repairer_id, `local`, content, phone, datetime, status) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{repairerId}, #{local}, #{content}, #{phone}, #{datetime}, 0)
mapper.select: WHERE repair.student_id = #{userId} ORDER BY repair.id DESC
mapper.sql: SELECT repair.*, `user`.school_number AS studentNumber, `user`.username as studentUsername, publicer.username as repairerName FROM repair LEFT JOIN plate_users AS `user` ON repair.student_id = user.id LEFT JOIN plate_users AS publicer ON repair.repairer_id = publicer.id
